channel.title: Community on Dwarves Foundation
channel.description: Recent content in Community on Dwarves Foundation

item.title: How much is your ICY worth
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: The value of ICY has undergone a fundamental shift. Previously, its price was fixed in terms of $USDC providing stability over the market.

item.title: How to swap ICY to BTC
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Before You Begin Make sure you have a Bitcoin (BTC) wallet ready to receive the BTC after the swap. If you donâ€™t have one, you can set up a BTC wallet using services like Electrum, Trust Wallet, UniSat or any other trusted BTC wallet provider.

item.title: How to set up crypto wallet to withdraw ICY
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: To withdraw ICY to Vietnam Bank or other fiat, you need set up 2 types of wallet in advance. On-chain wallet (Non-custodial wallet, such as: Coinbase, Metamask): This kind of wallet is needed to receive ICY and swap ICY to USDT.

item.title: How to withdraw ICY
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Before you can withdraw ICY, please make sure that you have already had the crypto wallet and Binance wallet. If you don’t have any, please follow this guideline.

item.title: Starting your journey at Dwarves Discord
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Welcome to Dwarves Network, We’ve grown a lot since launching our Discord server since the first day we made this network grow based on developers-centric.

item.title: Dwarves Community
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Dwarves Community is melting pot for software engineers, thinkers, learners and techies who are to explore, learn and master the latest advancements in technology.

item.title: $icy in 2024
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Follow up on our recent post df protocol, $icy and $dfg. Since 2020, $icy has been a part of our workflow.

item.title: Community Bounty
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: As you may know,Â Dwarves Discord networkÂ is where we connect with our friends, alumni, and like-minded people. Bounties are rewards (in ICY - Dwarvesâ€™ token) given out to community members for work that encourages community developers to get more involved in the development outside of their core skills.

item.title: Discord Roles
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: To organize our discord and make it fun to interact between community members, we setup those roles for specific purposes. They are ladder-based and function-based roles.
